Title: Call of the Dream
Description:
A great tree grows within the Dream. Soon, it will emerge in Azeroth.

But before it does, we must protect it from those who would do it harm or wield its power for their own ends. We must band together and see it through its verdant birth.

Join me and the others in the Ancient Bough. Together, we will travel into the Emerald Dream.
ObjectivesText: Complete the "Coalition of Flames" storyline from Shandris in Valdrakken, then travel to the Ancient Bough in the Ohn'ahran Plains.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Travel to the Ancient Bough in the Ohn'ahran Plains.

Objectives.Text: Complete "The Coalition of Flames" storyline from Shandris
